content.description: Start on obvious jug on the right side of the cave. The kick plate stone is off for your feet. Climb out the lip of the boulder moving left through gymnastic moves.Top out the left side of the boulder through a high dihedral.

content.location: behind the Brain.  Then you arrive at the Painted cave, go right (counterclockwise) around the Brain.  Some Graffiti saying "Where here" kinda points the right way.

content.description: Start with the large under cling and go up
content.location: Behind the Brain.  Then you arrive at the Painted cave, go right (counterclockwise) around the Brain.  Some Graffiti saying "Where here" kinda points the right way.

content.description: Start on the jug/crack, go up
content.location: behind the Brain.  Then you arrive at the Painted cave, go right (counterclockwise) around the Brain.  Some Graffiti saying "Where here" kinda points the right way.

content.description: Sit start with a low right-hand side pull and a left-hand sidepull/jug.  Use a bunch of fun heel and toe hooks for bonus points.
content.location: Go further downhill from black cloud.

content.description: Start at the back of the roof underclinging a hole, and move out the roof on pinches and crimps to the jugs at the lip of the roof.
content.location: To the right of the spray painted peace sign on the front of the Brain boulder

content.description: Sit start matched on a nice hold, with a few options for feet in the little overhang.  Bump your hands up and go for the nice horizontal crack.  Alternative hand starts in green can make the start harder.  I'm not confident about the grade, might go back and try it again later.  If anyone knows if this has a preexisting name, let me know.
content.location: go around clockwise starting at the painted cave with peace sign/white trash renaissance.

content.description: Great top rope climbs on vertical wall on the back side of this cluster offers some super chill 5.5/5.6 solos and has a great fully horizontal roof.
